root.title: torchmark tmk sell sink fund debentur
root.body: torchmark corp rais 200 mln dlr offer sink fund debentur due 2017 yield 8.65 pct sai lead manag first boston corp debentur 8-5/8 pct coupon price 99.73 yield 100 basi point run 9-1/4 pct treasuri bond 2016 non refund 10 year issu rate 2 moodi aa standard poor sink fund start 1998 retir 76 pct debentur matur give estim maximum life 22.4 year merril lynch co manag deal
